# Claim System Project Instructions

This is an overtime/meal allowance claim system built with Laravel 12, Livewire, and Tailwind CSS.

## Project Overview
- **Tech Stack**: Laravel 11, Livewire, Tailwind CSS
- **Purpose**: Overtime and meal allowance claim management
- **User Roles**: Staff, Approvers, HR Admins, Payroll
- **Key Features**: Claim submission, approval workflow, file uploads, reporting, notifications

## Development Guidelines
- Follow Laravel best practices
- Use Livewire for reactive components
- Implement role-based access control
- Maintain audit trails for all actions
- Use proper validation and security measures
